mapper.update: update biaodaa_admin.`tb_role` set `desc` = #{desc},`updated` = NOW() where rid = #{rid}
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_name FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_user_role ur ON u.uid = ur.uid LEFT JOIN tb_role r ON ur.rid = r.rid WHERE u.user_name = #{userName}

SELECT ifnull(count(1),0) FROM biaodaa_admin.`tb_role` t where 1=1
and t.desc like CONCAT('%',#{desc},'%')
and t.rid = #{rid}
and t.desc <> '超级管理员'
SELECT t.`rid`,t.`desc` FROM biaodaa_admin.`tb_role` t where t.rid <> 1
select t.desc from biaodaa_admin.`tb_role` t where t.desc = #{desc}
select t.desc from biaodaa_admin.`tb_role` t where t.rid = #{rid}
